eyb:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: [F] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [F]

eyb:AgilityStance.NAME: Agility Stance
DESCRIPTION: [A] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [A]

eyb:IntellectStance.NAME: Intellect Stance
DESCRIPTION: [W] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [W]

eyb:WillpowerStance.NAME: Willpower Stance
DESCRIPTION: [E] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [E]

eyb:BlessingStance.NAME: Blessing Stance
DESCRIPTION: [L] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [L]

eyb:CorruptionStance.NAME: Corruption Stance
DESCRIPTION: [D] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [D]
